law.catch_line: Certain Sections Of Chapter 74 And Sec. 12 B Of Chapter 76 Not Applicable To Agricultural And Technical Schools Under This Chapter
law.text: [Text of section effective until July 1 preceding the opening of the Essex North Shore agricultural and technical school. Repealed by 2004, 463, Sec. 1. See 2004, 463, Sec. 18 as amended by 2010, 130, Sec. 7.] Sections 3, 4, 5, 5A, 5B, 7, 7C, 8A, 23, 24, 32, 37A, 37B, 37C and 37F of chapter 74 and section 12B of chapter 76 shall not apply to agricultural and technical schools under this chapter or students enrolled at such schools.
